item.title: Understanding Microservices Architecture
item.description:
Introduction

Microservices architecture has become the de facto standard for building scalable applications…

Key Principles

  1. Single Responsibility: Each service does one thing well
  2. Independence: Services can be deployed independently
  3. Decentralization: Data and decision-making are distributed

Common Patterns

API Gateway

The API Gateway pattern provides a single entry point for all clients…

Service Discovery

In a dynamic environment, services need to discover each other…

Conclusion

Microservices offer significant benefits but require careful planning and implementation.
